text: Magar inmein jo log pukhta ilm rakhne waley hain aur imandaar hain woh sab us taleem par iman latey hain jo tumhari taraf nazil ki gayi hai aur jo tumse pehle nazil ki gayi thi. Is tarah ke iman laney waley aur namaz o zakat ki pabandi karne waley aur Allah aur roz-e-aakhir par saccha aqeeda rakhne waley logon ko hum zaroor ajar e azeem ata karenge
